name: typescript-router
description: A small, fully type-safe, TypeScript router

scripts.build: npm run build-es && npm run build-commonjs
scripts.build-es: tsc router.ts --outDir es --strict --noUnusedParameters --declaration --lib dom,es5,es6 --module es6 --target es6 --moduleResolution node
scripts.pretest: npm run build && tsc test/test.ts --lib dom,es5,es6 --strict --esModuleInterop --target es5

author: Alex Galays
